title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
description: PUBG is a fast-paced battle royale game where players fight for survival on dynamic maps filled with intense action and strategy.

title: Stardew Valley
description: A relaxing farming RPG where players grow crops, raise animals, and build relationships in a charming pixel world.

title: Hades
description: A roguelike dungeon-crawler where you battle out of the Underworld while uncovering a powerful story about family and defiance.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: Explore the vast world of Hyrule, solve puzzles, fight enemies, and uncover the secrets of a fallen kingdom.

title: Minecraft
description: A creative sandbox where players can build, mine, and explore endless worlds alone or with friends.

title: Valorant
description: A 5v5 character-based tactical shooter where precise gunplay meets unique agent abilities.

title: Among Us
description: A social deduction game where crewmates must find impostors before being sabotaged in space missions.

title: Genshin Impact
description: A stunning open-world action RPG featuring elemental combat and exploration across the fantasy land of Teyvat.

title: Apex Legends
description: A squad-based battle royale game with unique heroes, fast-paced combat, and fluid movement mechanics.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An epic story-driven RPG where you play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter exploring a morally complex fantasy world.
